Wasn't overly happy with my Love machine performance upscale when viewing it on my TV, compression made it too clean for my tastes, so I've switched to HEVC for this one and a larger size. Again, I'm no expert with upscaling just doing these for fun, I think this one turned out better though.

Enjoy!
